name: SideScroll BoB
description:
1bit black & white Super Mario Bros 3 Inspired 2d plattformer. 

Please gimme some feedback. If it´s got somewhat popular I will continue work on the project, may do it anyway, but not as priotized.

Current version ( Alpha 1.1 ) contains:

4 levels in similar size of classic SMB3-level. 

3 types of enimies

1 powerup (Shrooms that make you jump high )

Known bugs: 

-Sometimes get stuck into the ground landing from a jump

-Sometimes the hitdetection of jumping on enimes heads glitch, may cause you to lose HP
